oracle.iam.identity.dbs.service.provisioning.openfire

Class AccountProvisioning

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.iam.identity.foundation.AbstractAdapterTask
      • oracle.iam.identity.connector.service.Provisioning
        • oracle.iam.identity.dbs.service.provisioning.openfire.AccountProvisioning
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    oracle.hst.foundation.logging.Loggable, oracle.iam.identity.foundation.AbstractMetadataTask, oracle.iam.identity.foundation.AbstractServiceTask, oracle.iam.identity.foundation.AbstractTask

    public class AccountProvisioning
extends oracle.iam.identity.connector.service.Provisioning
    The AccountProvisioning acts as the service end point for Identity Manager to provision account properties to a Service Provider.
    This wrapper class has methods for account operations like create account, modify account, delete account etc.
    Since:
    1.0.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0.0
